fields.title: God's Existence: A Reflection
fields.reflection: I found the Five Ways both profound and challenging. The idea of pure actuality blew my mind.

fields.title: Work and Human Dignity
fields.reflection: Rerum Novarum shows how Church teaching uplifts laborers. A prophetic document.
fields.feedback: Solid but elaborate more next time.

fields.title: Body and Sacramentality
fields.reflection: The body expresses the person. I never thought about the human form as a sign of divine love.
fields.feedback: Deeply personal and theological. Well done.
